content.description:
Photograph of Harriet E. Vittum reading to children at the Northwestern University settlement house in Chicago, Illinois, 1914
DN-0062525, Chicago Daily News Collection, Chicago History Museum
content.question: Prior to the 1890s, people like those depicted in the image were most likely to receive assistance from

choices.label: government campaigns to provide electricity to households
federal regulations to prevent discrimination by banks and landlords
urban political machines seeking to win voters’ support
civil rights activists advocating against racial discrimination

content.answer: urban political machines seeking to win voters’ support

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
